# Core dependencies for Equilibrium
# These match the versions specified in pyproject.toml

# JAX and numerical computing
jax>=0.4

numpy>=1.26
scipy
networkx

# Code generation and formatting
jinja2
black

# Settings management
pydantic

platformdirs

# Plotting
matplotlib

# Tabular display
tabulate

# Symbolic mathematics
sympy
